text_block_list.text: (Knock knock knock)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, pardon the intrusion.
Coming in at this time, is something wrong? You're probably tired from the race, is it something urgent?
Coming in at this time, is something wrong? You're probably tired from the race, is it something urgent?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I don't really know if it would be considered urgent, but I just wanted to tell you as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: With today's victory, I realized something. After all this, I haven't really thanked Trainer-san properly.
Thanked me…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Even though I wasn't on your team, Trainer-san kindly listened to my worries.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And when I selfishly asked to transfer to your team, Trainer-san accepted.
If it's that… on the other hand, normally, it wouldn't be strange to say I was being meddlesome with another team.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Since joining <Sirius>, by just looking at the other members I can tell what kind of person Trainer-san is.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You're someone who believes in and kindly supports us.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thinking that, I wanted to properly thank you, but… do you think you can wait just a little bit longer?
Don't talk about waiting, you don't really need to thank me…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, I need to properly thank you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …from now on, let's see that "scenery" together, how's that?
Saying that, the expression on Silence Suzuka's face was just as gentle, and filled with joy, as when she was running.
…If it's that kind of gratitude, then that's another story. I'll definitely accept that kind of gratitude.
choice_data_list: Let's continue to look for that "scenery"!
Let's continue to look for that "scenery"!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes…!
Running as she desired, Silence Suzuka achieved her first victory as a member of <Sirius>.
With her in good condition and high spirits, what kind of "scenery" will she show me from now on?
With the way she is now, I believe her dreams will continue to overflow with these joyful emotions.
